00022

00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 namespace surfit {
00027 
00028 class vec;
00029 class intvec;
00030 class bitvec;
00031 
00042 class SURFIT_EXPORT oper_points : public oper {
00043 public:
00045         oper_points(vec * iweights, intvec * iweights_cnt, 
00046                     bitvec * imask_solved,
00047                     bitvec * imask_undefined,
00048                     int iN);
00049 
00051         virtual ~oper_points();
00052 
00053         REAL operator()(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00054         REAL at(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00055         
00056         REAL mult_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;
00057         REAL mult_transposed_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;
00058         
00059         virtual long cols() const;
00060         virtual long rows() const;
00061 
00062         REAL norm() const;
00063 
00064 protected:
00065 
00067         int N;
00068 
00070         bitvec * mask_solved;
00072         bitvec * mask_undefined;
00073         
00075         vec * weights;
00077         intvec * weights_cnt;
00078 
00079 };
00080 
00081 }; // namespace surfit;
